name: Umbra Lumen
description:
Umbra Lumen The Game:

Umbra Lumen is a small mysterious atmospheric top-down indie experience game with simple but beautiful graphics made in 7 days, for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1.
The name, originating from Latin, means "Shadow's Light".

This is the first game that I ever published. A huge amount of work went into this, so all feedback is appreciated and encouraged! Please leave your review if you play, no matter if you like the game or not.

Play on Fullscreen with audio on.

Review:

Please do not forget to review the game after you've played. Your feedback is very important to me and it helps me get better at doing what I love. Feel free to leave a comment, I would love to chat with you!

And do not forget to leave your vote for the game jam if you are also competing! Feel free to send a link to your game so I can check it out also.

The Story:

In Umbra Lumen, you play as a ball of light, lost in a dark world, trying to find the 9 Soul Sources hidden around the map.

On your way to find these mysterious objects, you will stumble upon Seekers,
spotlights searching for you. Once you've been spotted, Hunters can locate you and try to steal your light with their spikes.

As a lost fractured soul, fighting the darkness, you are aware of your inevitable ending. Your future might be getting brighter, but in the end, you are bound to cling to the shadows.

How To Play:
  • Movement: The movement is extremely complicated, all you need to do in order to move is CLICK!
  • Seekers: When they spot you with their light, they start siphoning your light. They slow you down and alert Hunters to your location.
  • Hunters: These bad boys once summoned will target you and attempt to spike you! You can use your light to deflect them. If you look at the spikes for a small duration of time, they will be deflected, thus turn around and attempt to cycle back only if you are still spotted by the seekers.
  • The strategy: The best strategy is to click far away at a safe place when a seeker spots you, and use your light to deflect the hunters. Try to move slowly and avoid getting detected by the seekers. Be careful not to get stuck next to the border of the map, if you find yourself close to the border while being attacked, attempt to move towards the middle.

Huge thank you to Spikes for coming in clutch with some edits on sounds, and everyone who helped with feedback!

Game design, models, sounds, music and scripts made by RawSauce using free software (Unity, Blender and Pro Tools First) and some of their default assets.

The only outside resource used is the outline of objects made possible via https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/particles-effects/quick-outline-1154...
